participant_1.background:
I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation.
I was so excited to finally graduate from college and start my career as a video game designer.
i m always hungry.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.
I've only been at my current job for a few months, but I'm already enjoying it.

participant_2.background:
I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
i love to clean.
i drive a fast sports car.
I like to pet my cat to relieve stress and forget about the day.

content.text: Hi, I just graduated from college and started my career as a video game designer!
Congrats! That sounds like a fun job!
Thanks! It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding.
What kind of video games do you design?
I mostly design action and adventure games.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to make a video game.
It's really fun! But it's also a lot of work.
I bet it is! I'm not sure I have the patience for it.
Well, it's definitely not for everyone. But if you're interested, I'd say go for it!
Thanks! Maybe I will one day.
You should! It's a lot of fun!
I am! I love my job.
